Package presentation

Class UiController

java.lang.Object
presentation.UiController
public class UiController extends Object
This class is to control the logic of the use interface. Talking to the UiManager class and to the business layer.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UiController(CharacterManager cm, AdventureManager am, EncounterManager em, UiManager ui)
    Constructor with parameters to create a user interface controller.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    run()
    Main method of the controller and of the project logic.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • UiController

      public UiController(CharacterManager cm, AdventureManager am, EncounterManager em, UiManager ui)
      Constructor with parameters to create a user interface controller.
      Parameters:
      cm - Instance of the CharacterManager class CharacterManager to talk with the business layer.
      am - Instance of the AdventureManager AdventureManager class to talk with the business layer.
      em - Instance of the EncounterManager class EncounterManager to talk with the business layer.
      ui - Instance of the UiManager class UiManager to print and receive data from the user.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Main method of the controller and of the project logic. If no problem finding the files is found. It will run infinitely until the exit option is pressed, presenting the user with the application's menu and executing the chosen option.
